item.title: install emacs and doom-emacs on os x catalina with brew
item.description: You have already installed brew, now you install the emacs cask. brew cask install emacs Next open and close emacs so it creates ~/.emacs.d, then install doom-emacs. git clone https://github.com/hlissner/doom-emacs ~/.emacs.d ~/.emacs.d/bin/doom install After install, configure and enable modules you need. Put this on your ~/.doom.d/config.el so you will be able to insert special characters with the right option key. ;; I need my Spanish Ã±. (setq mac-right-option-modifier nil)
